com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps
Class PlaceBet

java.lang.Object
  com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps.Bet
      com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps.PlaceBet

public class PlaceBet
extends Bet

A Place bet is on one of the six field numbers and wins if that number is rolled before a seven (7) is rolled. The bet pays odds based on the point selected. The payout schedule is as follows:

Point Payout Amount Multiple Example
4, 10 9:5 5 $5 bet pays $9
5, 9 7:5 5 $5 bet pays $7
6, 8 7:6 6 $6 bet pays $7

Author:
Doug Chuchro

PLACE_BET_TYPE_MAP

private static final java.util.Map<PlaceBet.PlaceBetType,PlaceBet.PlaceBetInfo> PLACE_BET_TYPE_MAP
Static lookup table of Proposition bets and their corresponding attribute values. This table (in the form of a Map) is populated by the static method createPlaceBetTypeMap().

See Also:
createPlaceBetTypeMap()
